name: AnimalReading
0:
”Alexa, open animal reading”
”Alexa, ask animal reading for my fortune”
”Alexa, start animal reading”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: animal reading
des:
Ask Alexa to open Animal Reading
She will greet you and wait for your animal to appear
She will tell you what your animal is and give you a message based on the energy the animal is associated with.
Reflect on the message for insight.
To further connect, you can work with the animal's image (figurine or picture)
Charmed in Company LLP is the oldest Mystical Metaphysical shoppe in NJ. We created this skill to introduce you to the energies and messages of animals and provide a fun and insightful way to pull from an animal's unique talents and strengths, or learn what energy assistance is needed at this time. You can ask for an animal reading as often as you desire.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
